sentence.text: This patient was the 2nd of 2 children.
The pregnancy was uncomplicated and she was delivered by a normal spontaneous vaginal delivery.
Her father is of Portuguese ancestry and her mother is Portuguese and Northern European ancestry.
Facial features of RS were recognized at birth.

Since that diagnosis, she has had several surgeries including a facial reconstruction to reduce her prominent chin and midface hypoplasia by replacing bone in her face and jaw with that from a rib around age 10 years.
Even with this surgery, she still has many of the features recognizable to RS, including frontal bossing, short nose and hypertelorism.
Currently, she displays mild short stature of 150 cm (<3%), an arm (wing) span of 138 cm and an OFC of 65.5 cm (>+6 SD).
She showed normal cognitive development and has 3 unaffected children.
